scripts.js: mkdir -p dist/assets/js/ && cat src/js/* > dist/assets/js/production.js && uglifyjs dist/assets/js/production.js -m -o dist/assets/js/production.js
scripts.build:assets: npm run styles && npm run autoprefixer && npm run img && npm run favicon && npm run fonts && npm run js
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:assets && npm run build:site
scripts.watch:css: onchange 'src/scss' -- npm run clear:styles && npm run styles && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.watch:img: onchange 'src/img' -- npm run clear:img && npm run img
scripts.watch:fonts: onchange 'src/fonts' -- npm run clear:fonts && npm run fonts
scripts.watch:js: onchange 'src/js' -- npm run clear:js && npm run js
scripts.watch: run-p watch:css watch:img watch:favicon watch:fonts watch:js
scripts.start: npm run clear && npm run build:assets && run-p serve watch
scripts.staging:
npm run build && echo 'User-agent: *
Disallow: /' > dist/robots.txt
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
